post.body: Hahaha that is so awesome!! I'm jealous! Are you still at your parents' house?
that hat is very cute! I really like your neckwarmers - they look so soft! :)
I hadn't heard of James Kochalka, so I looked him up - his comics are great! Thanks :).
That's so crazy that you saw Screech! Did he have lots of facial hair and look really struggling? I bet he did.
good luck with the scary vegans! try calming them with vegan baked goods.
"keep on doing what you do, but ask yourself, are you ready for a throwdown?!" Good luck, I'm sure you'll win! :)
@nastynick has such impressive vegan sandwich skills!! I wish he made *me* sandwiches like that!
thank you for the photo!! Now, in addition to being jealous, I am drooling. ;)
I'm so jealous, that sounds delicious!! good job murdering the yummy sandwich! ;)
aww, thanks for the hug :)! *hugs back*
congrats on getting the vest you wanted from your sister! :) Did she love her writing box?
slowly trying to lull the fibromyalgia into submission after the tantrum it's been throwing the last several days.
ate lots of veggies & fruit for lunch - trying to get back on my body's good side after the physical torture of travel/visiting family.
getting sleeeepy...meanwhile, @robgokeemusic is destroying cars and people while the teenager looks on. will i fall asleep if I try to read?
Barbie and Midge are such a cute couple!! :) http://tinyurl.com/a7d5xt
http://tinyurl.com/a4j4rw
OMG this is an *amazing* Christmas card:
having food delivered, took a nap with @robgokeemusic, now snuggling with the piglets & waiting for dinner to get here. SO glad to be home!
she only eats through a tube that goes directly into her stomach, and she has a phobia of swallowing. I am seriously disturbed by this.
I'm watching an Intervention about a *really* disturbing woman with a disgusting "atypical" eating disorder. Super festive!
